Name: Box Breathing
Description: Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s. Repeat 4 times.

Name: 4-7-8 Breathing
Description: Inhale 4s, hold 7s, exhale 8s. Repeat slowly 3 times.

Name: Body Scan
Description: Close your eyes and scan your body from head to toe, noticing tension.

Name: 2-Minute Focus
Description: Focus on your breath for 2 minutes. If your mind wanders, gently return.

Name: Stretch Break
Description: Stand and stretch your arms overhead. Hold for 5 seconds. Repeat 3x.

Name: Walk It Off
Description: Walk around for 5 minutes without your phone. Focus on your surroundings.

Name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
Description: Name 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.

Name: Feel Your Feet
Description: Place both feet on the ground. Feel the floor. Breathe slowly.

Name: You're doing your best
Description: You're doing your best. Take one step at a time.

Name: This too shall pass
Description: This too shall pass. You have overcome hard things before.

Name: Gratitude Note
Description: Write down one thing you're grateful for right now.

Name: Label Your Emotion
Description: Say: 'I'm feeling [emotion]. It's okay to feel this way.'
